long_description: The Kammok Dragonfly(TM) bug net is an ultralight no-see-um insect net specially designed to shield your Kammok Roo camping hammock (sold separately) from biting bugs. Dragonfly surrounds your hammock in 20-denier no-see-um polyester mesh for 360deg protection; material feels light as air and allows a cool breeze to easily pass through. Provides plenty of head room while you're sitting up. Quick and easy to set up. With every Dragonfly bug net purchase, Kammok provides life-saving treatments to five children diagnosed with malaria in Africa through a partnership with Malaria No More.
